collection.name: The Naked Nest
collection.openText: It can enter any hole of your body.

specialTipSize.specialTip: The observation suggests that employees with low HP are more susceptible to special ability while working. In particular, taking higher damage during work raises the probability of skill activation. However, when the result of work was good, special ability did not occur.

Some of the employees suffering from the phenomenon had the following symptoms. 1.Green skin and a rash on the body. 2.Drastically reduced movement speed. If any symptoms mentioned above are seen on any employee, remove them immediately.
After leaving employee #0 with similar symptoms for a certain time, it changed into a form similar to $0(hereby called O-02-74-1).

<Warning> Any employees that have been in contact with former employee, employee O-02-74-1 are likely to be infected as well. All employees in the department and section must be observed for any symptoms mentioned in management rule 2.
